'''Bouquet Balloons''' are objects found in the archery challenge [[Bullseye Balloons]] in the Windblume Festival.

When they are popped, the player will gain points. The amount of points given is greater than the points gained from [[Bloom Balloon]]s.

==Events==
*[[Invitation of Windblume]], Bullseye Balloons

==Notes==
* They can also be deployed with the gadget [[Windblume Festival Commemorative Balloon]].
* A variant with a different design, but the same gameplay role, can be found in the furnishing [[Leisure Device: On the Pulse]].
